column3: I'm not sure that "this may not matter" is the correct wording here. Additionally, might want to make the warning in the next sentence more clear. "If you need to open wallets with Bitcoin Core and wish to have the option to open them with binary releases or releases on different systems in the future, you may need to follow the steps under "Berkeley DB" above".\n

It seems extremely unlikely, though, that someone who goes through all the trouble to build on *bsd will try to open their wallet on another platform with a downloaded binary. But sure, can add that.\n
